remarks: Square root distributes over division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
resqrcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
resqrcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
sqrdivd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
sqrtdivd $p |- ( ph -> ( sqrt ` ( A / B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) / ( sqrt ` B ) ) ) $.
